message: Let's split fairly, Bob. This offer ensures we both benefit.
Your turn to be fair, Alice. I accepted a 45/55 split last round when the value was higher for me, so this is more than generous.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. This offer is still tilted in your favor considering the inflation.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm taking on more risk with each round, so this is my final offer above a 50/50 split.
Bob, this is cutting it close. I'm proposing a near even split, acknowledging the inflation working against you.
